alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Ocracoke Island; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 10:15PM EST until January 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the lower Neuse and Trent Rivers, Pamlico, Core and Back Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/11 PM 3.5 -2.3 1.1 1 None 22/11 AM 4.0 -1.8 1.1 1 None 22/11 PM 3.9 -1.9 1.4 0 None 23/12 PM 4.1 -1.7 1.4 0-1 None 24/12 AM 3.9 -1.9 1.3 1 None 24/12 PM 3.9 -1.9 1.4 1 None Ocracoke Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.9 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/09 PM 2.6 1.5 1.7 2 None 22/10 AM 3.0 1.9 1.9 2 Minor 22/11 PM 2.3 1.2 1.3 1-2 None 23/11 AM 2.3 1.2 1.3 1 None 23/11 PM 2.3 1.2 1.3 1 None 24/11 AM 2.1 1.0 1.2 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Ocracoke Island; Southern Craven
